info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 11:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL AND SOUTHEASTERN AVERY COUNTIES UNTIL 1130 PM EDT... At 1103 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 8 miles northwest of Lenoir, or 7 miles northwest of Gamewell, moving north at 5 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Lenoir, Gamewell, Edgemont, Globe, Collettsville, Patterson and Upton. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
